name: Let the Bad Guys Roll
description:
(Awesomely crafted) Lore and context:

The planet is under the attack of the diciest army in town and it is up to you to protect it.

How to play:

In this lateral space-invaders game, your ship is equipped with the latest in tech, just rolled out of factory ;)

The dice over the spacecraft indicates the enemies which can be destroyed by your weapons. You may re-roll the dice at any moment, but at the expense of getting a random outcome and spending some precious time.

Your trustworthy weapons are:

  • Bullets: Old but gold. Fire them at any time but bear this in mind: these dice-guys are tough and will only be knocked back by bullets.
  • Laser: Now we're talking. Your laser can fry the enemies, but only if the dices covered by the laser amount to the quantity on your spaceship's dice.

Should any enemy touch you or reach the planet, we are doomed!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows: Move.
  • Left click: Fire bullet (moves enemies around).
  • Right click: Fire laser (kills enemies, given the right alignment).
  • Space: roll the spaceship dice.
  • Escape: pause/resume.
